title: june 1: do the heimlich!
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the publishing of the Heimlich maneuver. After, she remembers the fire that destroyed thousands of Universal Music Group master tapes. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
